address: Summer Greens, Cape Town, South Africa
bio: I have 12+ years of experience as a Software Engineer, specializing in JavaScript/TypeScript, PHP, and NodeJS development with frameworks like Laravel, Angular, VueJS, and React. I have expertise in SQL/noSQL databases and DevOps tools (Docker, GitLab CI, Bitbucket Pipelines, Github Actions, AWS, etc.). I thrive in Agile environments, using Jira and gitflow workflows. As a former Tech Lead, I excel in technical documentation, cross-team collaboration, and efficient project delivery
